mapper.select: SELECT s1.*, s2.hid AS "parendRebate.hid", s2.rebate_a AS "parendRebate.rebateA", s2.rebate_b AS "parendRebate.rebateB", s2.rebate_c AS "parendRebate.rebateC", s2.min_bet AS "parendRebate.minBet", s2.max_bet AS "parendRebate.maxBet", s2.max_expect_bet AS "parendRebate.maxExpectBet" FROM ( SELECT * FROM site_lottery_rebates WHERE code = #{0} AND site_id = #{1} AND hid =#{2} AND bet_sort = #{3} ) s1 LEFT JOIN site_lottery_rebates s2 ON #{4} = s2.hid AND s1.code = s2.code AND s1.bet_sort = s2.bet_sort AND s1.site_id = s2.site_id

SELECT s1.*, s2.hid AS "parendRebate.hid", s2.rebate_a AS "parendRebate.rebateA", s2.rebate_b AS "parendRebate.rebateB", s2.rebate_c AS "parendRebate.rebateC", s2.min_bet AS "parendRebate.minBet", s2.max_bet AS "parendRebate.maxBet", s2.max_expect_bet AS "parendRebate.maxExpectBet" FROM ( SELECT * FROM site_lottery_rebates WHERE hid = #{hid} ) s1 LEFT JOIN site_lottery_rebates s2 ON #{parentHid} = s2.hid AND s1.code = s2.code AND s1.bet_sort = s2.bet_sort
